title: Bug in login feature
description: When attempting to log in, the page returns an error message instead of redirecting to the dashboard.

title: Performance issue on homepage
description: The loading time for the homepage is excessively long, causing a poor user experience.

title: Incorrect text displayed on product page
description: The description for product X on the product page is incorrect. It should read '100% cotton' but currently displays 'Made of synthetic materials.'
